config.script:
import time
		tagValue = system.tag.read('[default]Debarker/Alarms/MIS_Alarms_Reset').value
	
		if tagValue == 0:
			newValue = 1
	    	system.tag.write('[default]Debarker/Alarms/MIS_Alarms_Reset',newValue)
	    	time.sleep(1) 
	    	system.tag.write('[default]Debarker/Alarms/MIS_Alarms_Reset',0)

messageHandlers.script: system.perspective.openPopup('97oSJOmz', 'Primary/Downtime', showCloseIcon = False, draggable = False, resizable = False, modal = True )
